environment_overview:
1) The detected device is a Samsung refrigerator (ID: 51f02f33-4b43-11bf-2a6d-e7b5cf5be0ee) with capabilities including temperature measurement and thermostat cooling setpoint control. It is located in the pantry area and features components such as an icemaker and a scale. The refrigerator supports various functionalities, although some capabilities, like meat aging and food defrost, are currently disabled.

2) The current temperature of the Samsung refrigerator is 11°C. The device is powered on and can be controlled to check the temperature or adjust the cooling setpoint if necessary. The temperature measurement capability allows for monitoring the current state, while the thermostat cooling setpoint capability can be utilized to modify the temperature settings as required.
